mapper.select: SELECT c.coid as coid,c.coname as coname,c.costate as costate,c.covalue as covalue,t.personname as personname FROM conferenceroom c,tb_personinfo t WHERE c.persoid=t.persoid

SELECT m.coid as coid , m.metime as metime, m.meid as meid,m.mename as mename,m.mevalue as mevalue,m.menumber as menumber,m.medate as medate,m.mestate as mestate,c.coname as coname,t.PersonName as PersonName FROM meeting m ,conferenceroom c,tb_personinfo t WHERE m.coid = c.coid AND m.persoid = t.persoid and m.persoid=#{id} and m.mestate= "待审核"
